p.k: Art Germany (2008). Hrají: Harald Abdelhamed, Josef Bierbichler, Hark Bohm. Režie: Ina Weisse.
p.d: The successful Hamburg architect Georg Winter, his wife Eva and his two grown-up children Jan and Reh travel to attend Georg’s mother’s funeral in a snowy mountain village, where he grew up as a child. At the funeral the mysterious Hannah and her son Alex suddenly appear. She unearths a truth which drags the family into a vortex of desires and confusion. When a snow avalanche cuts the village off from the outside world, there’s no escape...
